cd ${PKG_ROOT}
go run ${WORK}/main.go
cd ${WORK}
cmp stdout want.txt

-- main.go --
package main

import . "github.com/efd6/dispear"

func main() {
	DESCRIPTION("pipeline")

	PIPELINE("other-pipeline").IGNORE_MISSING(true)

	Generate()
}
-- want.txt --
---
description: pipeline
processors:
  - pipeline:
      tag: pipeline_other-pipeline_5b4cac3b
      name: '{{ IngestPipeline "other-pipeline" }}'
      ignore_missing_pipeline: true
